introduction: This presentation explores strategic approaches to strengthening customer trust through after-sales support at Elexion Automotive. Our focus is on balancing exceptional customer care with cost-effective service solutions.

subsections.heading: Optimizing Customer Service Channels
subsections.content:
• In Q3 2025, an impressive 95% of roadside assistance requests were resolved within just half an hour, enhancing customer confidence in our support services.
• This rapid response rate significantly bolsters our customer trust metrics, aligning with our strategic goal of exceptional after-sales support.
• By maintaining a swift resolution time, we've mitigated potential customer dissatisfaction and fostered loyalty, crucial in the competitive EV market.
• The efficiency of our roadside assistance service positions Elexion as a leader in customer care, supporting our commitment to high service standards.
• Leveraging advanced support systems and technology, we ensure quick and effective service delivery, critical for sustaining customer trust.
• Our focus on swift resolutions not only addresses immediate customer needs but also strengthens long-term relationships and brand reputation.
subsections.justification: The content highlights effective after-sales service strategies, demonstrating quick issue resolution, which is essential for building customer trust and answering the DR Question.

subsections.content:

subsections.content:
• Historical cost-benefit analysis of customer service investments from 2012-2018

subsections.heading: Insights on Building Customer Trust
subsections.content:
• Historical analysis of trust-building strategies in the auto industry
• Review of past customer trust metrics and their evolution
• Examination of trust-related branding campaigns from 2010-2020
• Overview of legacy customer loyalty programs and their effectiveness
• Insights into historical trust metrics and their measurement evolution
• Case studies of past trust-building initiatives in related industries

conclusion: By optimizing our service channels and leveraging technology, we can enhance customer satisfaction while maintaining cost efficiency. Implementing these strategies will solidify our reputation and foster long-term customer loyalty.
